description: Use your microwave and air fryer to whip up speedy twice-cooked potatoes that are then tossed with bacon and kaleslaw. It's the ideal no-fuss potato salad.
name: Air-Fryer Potato Salad With Bacon & Kaleslaw Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800g Woolworths Cook potato baby herb & butter

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat air fryer to 200Â°C. Pierce potato packets several times with a small, sharp knife. Microwave on high for 6 minutes or until potatoes are just tender.
Place potatoes and bacon in air-fryer basket and slide basket into air fryer. Cook for 12 minutes or until bacon is crisp and potato is light golden. Halve potatoes.
Prepare kaleslaw according to packet instructions. Add bacon and potato, then toss to combine. Serve.
